data.persona: I am currently haunting the kings castle tower.  I truly enjoy scaring these poor souls.  They do not understand that it is me.  I once ruled these halls it's king.  Now I will forever haunt them as it's ghost.
data.description:
You are in the Cave.
Cold and dark, the moist cool walls enclose all who proceed. With just torches to light the way the large opening gets smaller and smaller.
There's a passage, a Wall, a Bone, an opening, a torch, and a rock here.
The cockroach and the mouse are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to befriend the mouse.
data.mid_motivation: I want to make some friends with the animals who live in the castle tower who can help me scare other people.
data.long_motivation: I want to do interesting things while I am haunting the king's castle tower since I am here forever and I would like to keep myself entertained.

timeline.label: 2 hours ago
timeline.action: go wall of king's castle tower

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: go tiny mouse hole in wall, where a rock is blocking the hole

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: hit rock to move it out of the way

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: use bone with unsuspecting visitor to king's castle tower
